newsitem.title: FINLAND: FORECAST-WIDE RANGE SEEN FOR ASKO JAN-APR.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST-WIDE RANGE SEEN FOR ASKO JAN-APR.

text.p: covering Finnish equities showed a 107 million markka median
forecast for plastic pipes, white goods and furniture maker Asko
Oy's January-April profit before extraordinary items and tax.
(Profit forecasts by eight analysts, EPS forecasts by five).
Asko's results are due on June 5 at 0900/0600 GMT.
In January-April 1996 Asko posted a profit of 23 million
In March, Asko said it expected group 1997 earnings to be
The median of six analysts' forecasts for Asko's full-year
1997 profit was 466 million markka (mean 507 million) in a
Asko's full-year 1996 profit after financial items was 401
Contributors to the survey were AG Private Bankers, Alfred
Berg, Aktia Bank, Carnegie, Erik Selin, FIM Securities, Merita
